question: You took your family to a nearby restaurant. You were disappointed with the meal and wish to complain to the manager. Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant. In the letter: explain why you were at the restaurant describe the problems write about the action you want the manager to take
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction with the service received while having lunch on 12th March.

My parents came from another city and I have heard a lot about the food that is being served in the restaurant so I decided to celebrate my mother’s birthday here. However, my experience was pathetic. I placed the order at 1 PM but the food wasn’t served until 1:45 PM. Besides, the waiter started to serve the main course without the starter. Apart from this, Even the bread was so hard to chew for me as well as my other family members. I did complain to the head immediately but he was least bothered to understand my situation; In the end, we paid the bill and left hungry.
I am hoping to receive an apology for the trouble and embarrassment I have to go through. I will await a response from your side.
